articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Steelers will head to playoffs despite Sunday night loss - WTAE Pittsburgh
articles.description: Pittsburgh lost for the second time in nine games but clinched a playoff spot thanks to losses by Miami and Indianapolis.
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA —Despite a loss against the Eagles Sunday night, the Steelers clinched a playoff spot thanks to losses by Miami and Indianapolis.
Jalen Hurts threw touchdown passes to A.J. Brown and De… [+3766 chars]
